Suddenly you bump into a man wearing black Armour and carrying guns. He is one of Alestrex Security Force. And you realized that you are on the banned road of Central Alestrex.
“Hey kid, what are you doing here? It’s illegal to enter these areas w/o permission.” yelled the guard. You showed the guard your Permission card that you’ve received from the Security Minister.
“You are the lad who managed to pass HS. Very well then” He lets you pass. You walk straight down the road when it splits into three.
► Go Straight ► Go Left ► Go Right
